apiDescription: An iterator over the lines of an instance of BufRead.
This struct is generally created by calling lines on a BufRead. Please see the documentation of lines() for more details.

trait implementations.name: impl<B> std::marker::Send for std::io::Lines<B> where B: std::marker::Send
impl<B> std::marker::Sync for std::io::Lines<B> where B: std::marker::Sync
